languages.text: Корабельное орудие, как правило, устанавливаемое на {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носу{/g} или на {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}башне{/g}. Стреляет мощным лучом, атакующим все цели на линии залпа. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Лэнс-излучатель{/g} наиболее эффективен против бронированных целей, но малоэффективен против быстрых целей с высоким {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонением{/g}.

A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lance weapons{/g} are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.
languages.original_text: Корабельное орудие, как правило, устанавливаемое на носу или на башне. Стреляет мощным лучом, атакующим все цели на линии залпа. Лэнс-излучатель наиболее эффективен против бронированных целей, но малоэффективен против быстрых целей с высоким {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонением{/g}.

traits.locale_text: A type of ship's weapons generally mounted on the prow or the dorsal. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. Lance weapons are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

A type of ship's weapons generally mounted on the prow or the dorsal. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. Lance weapons are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the prow or the dorsal. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. Lance weapons are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lance weapons{/g} are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

languages.text: Ein Raumschiffwaffentyp, der üblicherweise am {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} oder auf der {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g} montiert wird. Er feuert einen mächtigen Strahl ab, der alle Ziele in seiner Sichtlinie beschädigt. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffen{/g} sind gegen gepanzerte Ziele am wirksamsten, haben aber Schwierigkeiten, schnellere Ziele zu treffen, die gut {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}ausweichen{/g} können.
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lance weapons{/g} are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein Raumschiffwaffentyp, der üblicherweise am {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} oder auf der {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Oberseite{/g} montiert wird. Er {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}feuert{/g} einen mächtigen Strahl ab, der alle Ziele in seiner Sichtlinie beschädigt. Lanzenwaffen sind gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}gepanzerte{/g} Ziele am wirksamsten, haben aber Schwierigkeiten, schnellere Ziele zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}, die gut {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}ausweichen{/g} können.

languages.text: Type d'arme de vaisseau spatial généralement monté sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} ou le {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dos{/g}. Elle tire un puissant faisceau qui endommage toutes les cibles situées dans sa ligne de mire. Les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} sont particulièrement efficaces contre les cibles blindées, mais peinent à atteindre les cibles plus rapides dotées d'une grande capacité d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g}.
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lance weapons{/g} are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Type d'arme de vaisseau spatial généralement monté sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} ou le {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dos{/g}. Elle {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}tire{/g} un puissant faisceau qui endommage toutes les cibles situées dans sa ligne de mire. Les lances sont particulièrement efficaces contre les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}blindées{/g}, mais peinent à {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}atteindre{/g} les cibles plus rapides dotées d'une grande capacité d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g}.

Type d'arme de vaisseau spatial généralement monté sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} ou le {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dos{/g}. Elle tire un puissant faisceau qui endommage toutes les cibles situées dans sa ligne de mire. Les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} sont particulièrement efficaces contre les cibles blindées, mais peinent à atteindre les cibles plus rapides dotées d'une grande capacité d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g}.

languages.text: 虚空舰的武器，通常安装{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}上。它会发射一束强大的光束，对炮击射线上所有目标造成伤害。{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}对拥有厚重装甲的目标非常有效，但很难命中擅长{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}的高速目标。
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lance weapons{/g} are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰的武器，通常安装{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}上。它会发射{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}{/g}一束强大的光束，对炮击射线上所有目标造成伤害。光矛武器对拥有厚重装甲的目标非常有效，但很难{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}擅长{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}的高速目标。

languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the prow or the dorsal. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. Lance weapons are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

languages.text: Un arma de nave del vacío normalmente instalada en la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} o el {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. Dispara un potente rayo que daña a todos los objetivos en su línea de fuego. Las {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armas de lanza{/g} son muy eficaces contra los enemigos acorazados, pero no suelen impactar a los objetivos rápidos con mayor {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g}.
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lance weapons{/g} are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un arma de nave del vacío normalmente instalada en la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} o el {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Dispara{/g} un potente rayo que daña a todos los objetivos en su línea de fuego. Las armas de lanza son muy eficaces contra los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}acorazados{/g}, pero no suelen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} a los objetivos rápidos con mayor {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}に搭載されるヴォイドシップ兵器のタイプの一つ。強力な光線を放ち射線上の全てのターゲットにダメージを与える。{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}は装甲したターゲットに最も効果的であるが、素早く{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避能力{/g}の高いターゲットに攻撃を命中させるのは難しい。
languages.original_text: A type of voidship weapon generally mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} or the {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g}. It fires a powerful beam that damages all targets in its line of fire. {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lance weapons{/g} are most effective against armoured targets but struggle to land hits on quicker targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}に搭載されるヴォイドシップ兵器のタイプの一つ。強力な光線を{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}放ち{/g}射線上の全てのターゲットにダメージを与える。ランスウェポンは{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}装甲{/g}したターゲットに最も効果的であるが、素早く{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避能力{/g}の高いターゲットに攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中させる{/g}のは難しい。
